channel.title: Lynch on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in Lynch on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Dumbland
item.description: Crude animations seem to be more analyzable than full-range expression movies. There must be a line between overanalyzing, getting tangled in dumbland, and underanalyzing, being dumblander by the virtue of that.

item.title: Eraserhead
item.description: It should be my favorite Lynch even though I forgot when I watched his thing the last time. Not that I’m going to rewatch this one any time soon, but it is too good.
